Class BannerBaseAdUnit

java.lang.Object
org.prebid.mobile.AdUnit
org.prebid.mobile.BannerBaseAdUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
BannerAdUnit, InterstitialAdUnit
public abstract class BannerBaseAdUnit extends AdUnit
Contains Banner and Video parameters.
